Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a scenario where people need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can draw a device, like a string telephone, that uses sound to solve the communication problem.
The student can include labels or notes that identify scientific information used to design their communication device.
The student can illustrate that the device can send or receive information over a certain distance.
The student can show that only the provided materials are used in the device design.
The student can evaluate whether their design meets the communication needs by using sound.
The student can depict how the device helps people communicate over long distances using sound.
